Question: Which of the following accolades did Reese Witherspoon receive for her performance in the movie 'Hot Pursuit' (2015)?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Comedy Actress at the Teen Choice Awards
B. Nominated for Best Hissy Fit at the Teen Choice Awards
C. Won Best Actress at the Teen Choice Awards
D. Nominated for Best Supporting Actress at the Teen Choice Awards
Answer: Nominated for Best Comedy Actress at the Teen Choice Awards, Nominated for Best Hissy Fit at the Teen Choice Awards
